caption.p: Assessment of protective efficacy induced by protein-based EDIII vaccine. Na√Øve ( a) and vaccinated ( b) mice ( n = 8) were intravenously challenged at four weeks after vaccination with 10 4 PFU of ZIKV- PRVABC59 strain. Upon ZIKV challenge, the viral load was monitored for up to seven days. Graphs show days post-challenge on the x-axis versus viral load on the y-axis. Continuous blue and red lines represent one mouse each for each of the control and vaccinated groups. ( c) Peaks of viral titers for each individual mouse and for each group. ( d) Sera from immunized mice were tested for ELISA reactivity on ZDIII-coated plates; the dashed line marks the limit of the assay. ( e) Antibody titers from the curves shown in (b). *** p < 0.001
